title: What kind of font is this ?
content:
What kind of font is this? Help please !!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612013504im_/http:/typophile.com/files/troy-lee-logo_5877.jpg)
author: Louisvdb

comments.content:
Looks handwritten to me, meaning not a font (3 different /e's).  
Suggestions for alternatives: [http://typophile.com/node/97495#comment-527591](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612013504/http:/typophile.com/node/97495#comment-527591 "http://typophile.com/node/97495#comment-527591"), [http://typophile.com/node/98661#comment-532986](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612013504/http:/typophile.com/node/98661#comment-532986 "http://typophile.com/node/98661#comment-532986"), [Mika Melvas'](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612013504/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Mika_Melvas/) (Signalist for instance), [Blue Vinyl Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612013504/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Blue_Vinyl_Fonts/) (Fancier, Parsley...)
